panels.description: 所有服务每秒请求量作和
panels.title: 被调总请求(每秒)

targets.expr: topk(10, sum(increase(rpc_server_handled_total{env=~"$env", code_type!="success"}[1m])) by (app, instance) / sum(increase(rpc_server_handled_total{env=~"$env"}[1m])) by (app, instance))
topk(10, sum(rate(process_cpu_time_seconds_total{env=~"$env"}[1m])) by (app, instance) * 2 / sum(process_cpu_cores{env=~"$env"}) by (app, instance))
